dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You know, I think a lot of people assume when something tragic happens abroad, the victim's home country can't do much, but that's not always true.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, I think a lot of people assume when something tragic happens abroad, the victim's home country can't do much, but that's not always true.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh absolutely, like in this case with Akmaral Mukanova, the Kazakh Deputy Foreign Minister Aibek Kuantyrov is already involved.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh absolutely, like in this case with Akmaral Mukanova, the Kazakh Deputy Foreign Minister Aibek Kuantyrov is already involved.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs, Aibek Kuantyrov, commented on the death of Kazakhstani citizen Akmaral Mukanova in Egypt.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he confirmed her body is being sent back to Kazakhstan today, and get this—apparently at the expense of the Egyptian side.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he confirmed her body is being sent back to Kazakhstan today, and get this-apparently at the expense of the Egyptian side.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kuantyrov, speaking on the sidelines of the Mazhilis, stated that today the body of the deceased will be sent back to Kazakhstan. The body is planned to be sent today after all procedures are completed, as far as I know, at the expense of the Egyptian side.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's uh, a significant detail. And they mentioned moral compensation has been resolved too, which is pretty rare to hear about so quickly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's uh, a significant detail. And they mentioned moral compensation has been resolved too, which is pretty rare to hear about so quickly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The issue of moral compensation has also been resolved.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the travel insurance from their Kazakhstani company is also in the picture, which must be a relief for the family.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the travel insurance from their Kazakhstani company is also in the picture, which must be a relief for the family.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, the insurance company, our Kazakhstani company, which covered the travel insurance, has also been involved.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the two other women who were injured, they've already returned home, which is good to hear.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the two other women who were injured, they've already returned home, which is good to hear.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The two citizens who received minor injuries have also returned, Kuantyrov reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But the big question on everyone's mind is whether there'll be a criminal case, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the big question on everyone's mind is whether there'll be a criminal case, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Kuantyrov said an investigation is underway by Egypt's Ministry of Civil Aviation, but he wasn't aware of any criminal case yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Kuantyrov said an investigation is underway by Egypt's Ministry of Civil Aviation, but he wasn't aware of any criminal case yet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Deputy Minister responded that an investigation is underway, and he was not aware of any criminal case. A commission has been set up by the Egyptian Ministry of Civil Aviation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like it's still in the procedural phase. He did mention Kazakhstan would be involved if a more detailed investigation happens.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like it's still in the procedural phase. He did mention Kazakhstan would be involved if a more detailed investigation happens.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As for a criminal case, I cannot say because the investigation is still procedural. But I think Kazakhstan will be involved if a more detailed investigation is carried out.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which makes sense, since it involves their citizen. They're keeping it under control, which is reassuring.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which makes sense, since it involves their citizen. They're keeping it under control, which is reassuring.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In any case, we are keeping this issue under control, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The whole thing is just so tragic—a falling advertising board at Sharm El-Sheikh airport on May 17th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The whole thing is just so tragic-a falling advertising board at Sharm El-Sheikh airport on May seventeenth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It's worth noting that on May 17, a Kazakhstani woman died after a falling advertising board struck her at Sharm El-Sheikh airport.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Witnesses said the impact was so strong the victims were in shock. Can't even imagine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Witnesses said the impact was so strong the victims were in shock. Can't even imagine.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to witnesses, the impact was so strong that the victims were taken away in a state of shock.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And her relatives publicly asked for help bringing her body back, which must have added pressure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And her relatives publicly asked for help bringing her body back, which must have added pressure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The relatives of the deceased, Akmaral Mukanova, have requested assistance in transporting her body and appealed to the people of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's good to see both governments stepping up, though. Shows some coordination in a really difficult situation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's good to see both governments stepping up, though. Shows some coordination in a really difficult situation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Let's hope the investigation brings some answers for the family.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Let's hope the investigation brings some answers for the family.
